properties.name: Cappadocia (Goreme)
properties.description: Surreal landscape of fairy chimneys, cave churches, and iconic hot air balloon rides at sunrise

properties.name: Hagia Sophia
properties.description: 6th-century architectural masterpiece, former cathedral and mosque, now a mosque again with stunning Byzantine mosaics

properties.name: Pamukkale
properties.description: Cotton Castle travertine terraces of white calcium deposits with ancient Hierapolis spa city (UNESCO)

properties.name: Blue Mosque (Sultan Ahmed)
properties.description: Istanbul's iconic six-minaret mosque famous for its blue Iznik tile interior

properties.name: Ephesus
properties.description: Best-preserved ancient Greek-Roman city with famous Library of Celsus (UNESCO)

properties.name: Derinkuyu Underground City
properties.description: Largest excavated underground city in Cappadocia, 8 levels deep, sheltered 20,000 people

properties.name: Mount Nemrut
properties.description: 2,134m summit with colossal stone head statues from 1st century BC Commagene Kingdom (UNESCO)

properties.name: Topkapi Palace
properties.description: Ottoman sultans' opulent palace complex overlooking the Bosphorus
